uk.co.strangeskies.fx

Class FXMLLoadBuilder<C>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.strangeskies.fx.FXMLLoadBuilder<C>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - the controller type

    public class FXMLLoadBuilder<C>
extends Object
    A simple utility class for simplifying FXML resource loading. Common configuration is avoided by providing behavior according to conventions.

    • Constructor Summary

      • build

        public static FXMLLoadBuilder<Object> build()
        Returns:
        an FXMLLoadBuilder over the default backing loader

      • controller

        public <D> FXMLLoadBuilder<D> controller(D controller)
        Configure the builder to load directly into the given controller instance.

        Unless an exact resource is given, the resource location will be derived according to FXUtilities.getResource(Class), or FXUtilities.getResource(Class, String) if a resource name is specified.

        Type Parameters:
        D - the type of the controller object
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller object to load into
        Returns:
        the receiving instance

      • controller

        public <D> FXMLLoadBuilder<D> controller(Class<D> controllerClass,
                                         D controller)
        Configure the builder to load directly into the given controller instance.

        Unless an exact resource is given, the resource location will be derived according to FXUtilities.getResource(Class), or FXUtilities.getResource(Class, String) if a resource name is specified.

        Type Parameters:
        D - the type of the controller object
        Parameters:
        controllerClass - the controller class to load into
        controller - the controller object to load into
        Returns:
        the receiving instance

      • controller

        public <D> FXMLLoadBuilder<D> controller(Class<D> controllerClass)
        Configure the builder to load into a controller of the given class via FXMLLoader.setControllerFactory(javafx.util.Callback).

        Unless an exact resource is given, the resource location will be derived according to FXUtilities.getResource(Class), or FXUtilities.getResource(Class, String) if a resource name is specified.

        Type Parameters:
        D - the type of the controller class
        Parameters:
        controllerClass - the controller class to load into
        Returns:
        the receiving instance

      • resource

        public FXMLLoadBuilder<C> resource(String resourceName)
        The FXML resource name, such that the resource be located according to FXUtilities.getResource(Class, String).
        Parameters:
        resourceName - the name of the FXML resource
        Returns:
        the receiving instance
